entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
